channel.title: Guide to a Pure (1defence) (Using Rsbots)
channel.description:
Getting Started.
Training a pure can be difficult and Rewarding. The best things to do before you quest is to head on up to Clay and mine till about 20 mining, You'll Make 100k. Buy iron armour set, Mithril, Adamant, Rune Scimitar. (reason no bronze/iron is because you should do Vampire slayer witch will give you 20 Attack) and some Bronze arrows. Now head on up to Seagulls
Seagulls are located at the Portsarim Docks. They Have a max hit of 1 and will never hit you in iron. They are 8Hp each and drop nothing of value but will get you 40 Attack and Strength in notime.
Once you get 40 Attack And Strength Sell your Scimitars and buy All bows, Full leather, and as many Bronze arrows as you can. (if they don't sell buy some from the varrock store and wait for yours to come). Use your arrows at Seagulls, 1k should get you roughly 30-35 Ranged. Now Mine Some Iron untill 50 Mining. You'll make roughly 200k-300k. Do Imp Catcher, Witch's potion and the Stronghold of Safety and you'll get about 14 Mage. Buy 5k Mind runes, 1 Air Staff and head to the Lesser Demon at the Wizards Tower. AutoFighter Pro or Afk it legitly You Decide. You should end up with 30 Magic, 35 Ranged, 40 Attack, 40 Strength.
[hr] [center][size=50pt][shadow=blue,left]Quests[/shadow][/size][/center] [center]You will need quests to become a sucsesfull pure. Pures are built on quests. They save time and can keep your attack 60 whilst having [u][b]Adamant gloves[/b][/u], Unless you are going to max out as in 99 attack, 99 strength 1 defence. I'd follow this guide. If not, follow it somewhere down the line, these will help you alot.[/center]
[left][size=18pt]Good quests:[/size][/left] These quests are Reccomended. These will not get you any Defence levels or prayer levels. If they do, i'll say witch ones do:
[u]Attack Quests[/u] Vampire slayer 4825xp Mountain Daughter 1000xp (and 2000 prayer xp) TokTz-Ket-Dill 5000xp (and 5000 strength xp | not needed |) Tai Bwo Wannai Trio 2500xp (and 2500 strength xp) Death Plateau 3000xp Tree Gnome Village 11450xp Fight Arena 12175xp Waterfall Quest 13750xp (and 13750 strength xp) The Grand Tree 18400xp (and 2150 magic xp) Undergronud Pass 3000xp
[u]Strength Quests[/u] strength xp rewards: Tai Bwo Wannai Trio 2500xp (and 2500 attack xp) Land of the goblins 3000xp (and and 2000 pray xp) Troll romance 4000xp Horror from the deep 4662.5xp (and 4662.5 magic xp, 4662.5 ranged xp) TokTz-Ket-Dill 5000xp (and 5000 attack xp |not needed|) Scorpian Catcher 6625xp Dealing with scabaras 7000xp (and 7000 pray xp) Roving elves 10000xp Waterfall quest 13750xp (and 13750 attack xp) Haunted Mine 22000xp The Path of Glouphrie 30000xp (and 5000 magic xp)
[u]Other Useful quests & reason why:[/u] Annimal Magnatisum- avas accumulator Horror from the deep - prayer books -Zamorak, Guthix, Saradomin Another slice of H.A.M - ancient mace (Used for Bandos), teles to Goblin City Death Plateau - Climbing Boots (+2 Strength) Family crest - gauntlets (cook/gold/Chaos) Ghosts ahoy - ectophial the great brain robbery - Barrelchest Anchor haunted mine - salve ammy (melee bonus vs undead) Underground Pass - iban staff+spell. only needs 50magic and hits up to 25. Mountain daughter - bear helm (best 1def headgear, dont need to finish quest to get) Recipe for disaster - addy gloves (ogre, dwarf, goblin, pirate, evil dave, monkey) Rolving elves - crystal bow and ability to wield them (still looks cool but broad bolts are better) Temple of ikov - armadyl ammy (godwars safe item for armadyl encampent) Gertrudes cat - ability to buy and raise cats. takes about 3-4 hours to grow, after that you can sell them for 100 death runes in west ardougne.
[u]Defence Quests, DO NOT DO THESE!:[/u] a soul's bane in search of the myreque in aid of the myreque nature spirit (do this quest for Initite pure) what lies below fremennik trials heroes quest between a rock defender of varrock observatory quest (about 15% chance of getting defence. learn about the reward before finishing) olafs quest dream mentor holy grail (prayer xp) dragon slayer monkey madness (talking to daero once you have finished killing the demon) kings ransom Most Requirements for Temple At stenstien (or w/e its pronounced)
[center][size=36pt][glow=red,2,300]Pay to Play training.[/glow][/size][/center] Loads of money making ways to do this here are alot of commonly done ones: Desert Goats 30k Xp 150k cash ph Al-karid Warriors 100k-300k cash Ph 20k xp Chaos druids (edgevile) 250k 20k xp ph Chaos Druids (Yanile) 400k - 25k Aviansie (Prayer)30k 200k-300k Flesh Crawlers 30k 200k-400k Soulwars 50k 0gp
I did goats from, 40 attack, 40 strength 35 range to all 70's at goats (exept for attack witch i quested). I made alot of money, about 5m-8m Once you have 70 range, do some Prayer Aviansie till 75 (if you don't have prayer, killing chaos druids will do) 60 attack and Strength You have your Dragon Scimitar God book, Black d'hide chaps. Train at these spots. With trout, Lobster, Aviansie with prayer. If you have a Verry low budget i'd do SoulWars for 100 Zeal, getting you about 50-55 Magic from 35. Once you have 40+ Do Mage Training Arena for mage exp and cash. (See bottom of this page for my Mage Training Guide). [center][img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/4840/100509175137.png[/img] [/center] [center][img]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/8933/100428182837.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img693.imageshack.us/img693/7679/100612131232.png[/img][/center][center]Yes that was done with air strikes :P i had 89 zeal not 47 :S[/center]
[center][size=24pt][shadow=cyan,right]Food to use[/shadow][/size][/center] If your going to be Training, I suggest trout or lobster. Skilling, Trout or Salmon Air orbs trout or salmon.
Pking P2P Shark/Rocktail/Tuna Potato Pking F2P Lobster, Swordfish [hr]
[center][glow=green,2,300][size=24pt]$$$Money$$$[/size][/glow][/center] Getting Money on a pure can be quite tough, especially if you have no items. Go to bob's axes in Lumbridge, turn pikey mode on and take the free Bronze pickaxe and Bronze hatchet.
Woodcut to about 20 on Normal logs and sell to buy mithril and adamant. [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/6153/100506233012.png[/img]
Mine to about 20 on Clay and buy mithril, adamant and rune pickaxe. I'd suggest getting 60-70 in both of these skills, they are great money makers. [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/3458/100524010010.png[/img]
Tanning Hides can be anything from 100k f2p to 500k P2P per hour. You just need 2 know what one is best. Tanning 1 hide costs 20Gp. Add 20gp to the cost of the Untanned hide and then check the price of the Tanned hide. If you profit, do it. [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/4906/100405155236.png[/img]
70 Thieving is a great source of money. You can rake in 5m and get a nice stat to 70. 1-25 Women at varrock 25-38 Ardy Warriors 38-99 Master farmers at Draynor.
Flax spinning is Great. 19k Xp ph with 230k Cash ph. Brilliant way to make cash. Do this in a PvP world Lumbridge. It's a safe zone and nobody will think to find you there. [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/6234/100611230425.png[/img]
Smithing Cannon balls is about 10k exp Ph with 100k Cash ph! No pic for this :(
Sorceress Guarden is a Great way to make cash. Its the Non-cb GDK Imo. 3k Farm xp ph and 300k cash ph, Epic or what?!^_^ [hr]
[hr] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4084/100621185418.png[/img] [b]Thanks to mining bot for letting me use this pic. Yes that is 55M gained![/b] Picking Flax is a nice way to make money if you don't have SwampToads (witch is a waste of cash atm) [URL=http://swiftkit.net][IMG]http://img693.imageshack.us/img693/4928/100610204222.png[/img][/URL] [center][size=36pt][shadow=red,left]To Pray or not to Pray[/shadow][/size][/center] Getting Prayer on a pure Mainly is down to 2 things, If your going to do bosses such as Godwars, Fire cape or If you are going to Nh pk or if you dont want to be rushed in PvP/BH.
Imo, prayer is worth it. Godwars, Fire Cape are just to good 2 miss out on. Barrows is even easily done on a 1 defence pure. Aviansies are good 2 do to.
Prayer is a downside on one thing imo. Combat level. A pures aim IMO is to stay the lowest combat with nice Pking stats. Praying will not help this. Although you do need 13 Prayer to do Desert Treasure.
[center][size=24pt][glow=cyan,2,300]Defence?!?![/glow][/size][/center] Getting 2 Defence will not make you "ruined" infact most sucsessful pures have had some slips. Dutch Lmfao got 3 defence, Bonesaw Pk is 21, Wtf_elvemage gotten 46 Before Turmoil. Just don't let the Fact of a defence level change your mind about staying a pure. Being a pure is Great. Only get 45 Defence when you feel you are ready. Basicly when you have time to do quests, Torso and if you don't have AutoPestcontrol Pro time to get void. Barrows gloves are not 100% needed but they make you look better than some faggy little bracelet. Rune Gloves arn't the best for a rune pure but are a pritty decent glove to wear. 20 Defence pures can also wear rune gloves.
Berserker pures also have enough Defence to Abyssal Runecraft. Also GDK and tank Aviansie. And do much better GWD. But take it from me. We get Faggy targets that think they are pro because they pray your dds spec, ROL, Farcast and cry about venge. Pures imo have alot of Honour. When i was a pure people ate, never prayed. People Didn't safe much. 90% of people were willing to DM.

item.title: Guide to a Pure (1defence) (Using Rsbots)
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:5, topic:360851”]By the way… I like your guide but…

Getting 40 attack and strength in f2p, the DUMBEST thing to do.

I suggest getting ranged/magic, as both are fairly easy to train and magic you won’t get too much exp. I suggest getting attack levels from the quests shown, because really you want attack last, because it gets higher combat therefore, if you like pking at level 20-40, you want high range/str/mage before attack and prayer.

Trust me I have been through like 4 pures.[/quote]

I agree but the quests are designed for people who want to do dt and such and most people want 50-60 attack so thats why

Read full topic

item.title: Guide to a Pure (1defence) (Using Rsbots)

@the_elve_age wrote:

By the way… I like your guide but…

Getting 40 attack and strength in f2p, the DUMBEST thing to do.

I suggest getting ranged/magic, as both are fairly easy to train and magic you won’t get too much exp. I suggest getting attack levels from the quests shown, because really you want attack last, because it gets higher combat therefore, if you like pking at level 20-40, you want high range/str/mage before attack and prayer.

Trust me I have been through like 4 pures.

item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob

@marcbob wrote:

scipyo:

Amazing guide I might make a pure just for the sake of using this

thanks i im going to add some pking tips and summoning too prolly

I bought 10k iron arrows and I went from 1-57 and I still have 5k arrows.

Read full topic

item.title: Guide to a Pure (1defence) (Using Rsbots)
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Getting Started.

Training a pure can be difficult and Rewarding. The best things to do before you quest is to head on up to Clay and mine till about 20 mining, You’ll Make 100k. Buy iron armour set, Mithril, Adamant, Rune Scimitar. (reason no bronze/iron is because you should do Vampire slayer witch will give you 20 Attack) and some Bronze arrows. Now head on up to Seagulls

Seagulls are located at the Portsarim Docks. They Have a max hit of 1 and will never hit you in iron. They are 8Hp each and drop nothing of value but will get you 40 Attack and Strength in notime.

Once you get 40 Attack And Strength Sell your Scimitars and buy All bows, Full leather, and as many Bronze arrows as you can. (if they don’t sell buy some from the varrock store and wait for yours to come).
Use your arrows at Seagulls, 1k should get you roughly 30-35 Ranged.
Now Mine Some Iron untill 50 Mining. You’ll make roughly 200k-300k.
Do Imp Catcher, Witch’s potion and the Stronghold of Safety and you’ll get about 14 Mage.
Buy 5k Mind runes, 1 Air Staff and head to the Lesser Demon at the Wizards Tower.
AutoFighter Pro or Afk it legitly You Decide. You should end up with 30 Magic, 35 Ranged, 40 Attack, 40 Strength.

[hr]
[center][size=50pt][shadow=blue,left]Quests[/shadow][/size][/center]
[center]You will need quests to become a sucsesfull pure. Pures are built on quests. They save time and can keep your attack 60 whilst having Adamant gloves, Unless you are going to max out as in 99 attack, 99 strength 1 defence. I’d follow this guide. If not, follow it somewhere down the line, these will help you alot.[/center]

[left][size=18pt]Good quests:[/size][/left]
These quests are Reccomended. These will not get you any Defence levels or prayer levels. If they do, i’ll say witch ones do:

Attack Quests
Vampire slayer 4825xp
Mountain Daughter 1000xp (and 2000 prayer xp)
TokTz-Ket-Dill 5000xp (and 5000 strength xp | not needed |)
Tai Bwo Wannai Trio 2500xp (and 2500 strength xp)
Death Plateau 3000xp
Tree Gnome Village 11450xp
Fight Arena 12175xp
Waterfall Quest 13750xp (and 13750 strength xp)
The Grand Tree 18400xp (and 2150 magic xp)
Undergronud Pass 3000xp

Strength Quests
strength xp rewards:
Tai Bwo Wannai Trio 2500xp (and 2500 attack xp)
Land of the goblins 3000xp (and and 2000 pray xp)
Troll romance 4000xp
Horror from the deep 4662.5xp (and 4662.5 magic xp, 4662.5 ranged xp)
TokTz-Ket-Dill 5000xp (and 5000 attack xp |not needed|)
Scorpian Catcher 6625xp
Dealing with scabaras 7000xp (and 7000 pray xp)
Roving elves 10000xp
Waterfall quest 13750xp (and 13750 attack xp)
Haunted Mine 22000xp
The Path of Glouphrie 30000xp (and 5000 magic xp)

Other Useful quests & reason why:
Annimal Magnatisum- avas accumulator
Horror from the deep - prayer books -Zamorak, Guthix, Saradomin
Another slice of H.A.M - ancient mace (Used for Bandos), teles to Goblin City
Death Plateau - Climbing Boots (+2 Strength)
Family crest - gauntlets (cook/gold/Chaos)
Ghosts ahoy - ectophial
the great brain robbery - Barrelchest Anchor
haunted mine - salve ammy (melee bonus vs undead)
Underground Pass - iban staff+spell. only needs 50magic and hits up to 25.
Mountain daughter - bear helm (best 1def headgear, dont need to finish quest to get)
Recipe for disaster - addy gloves (ogre, dwarf, goblin, pirate, evil dave, monkey)
Rolving elves - crystal bow and ability to wield them (still looks cool but broad bolts are better)
Temple of ikov - armadyl ammy (godwars safe item for armadyl encampent)
Gertrudes cat - ability to buy and raise cats. takes about 3-4 hours to grow, after that you can sell them for 100 death runes in west ardougne.

Defence Quests, DO NOT DO THESE!:
a soul’s bane
in search of the myreque
in aid of the myreque
nature spirit (do this quest for Initite pure)
what lies below
fremennik trials
heroes quest
between a rock
defender of varrock
observatory quest (about 15% chance of getting defence. learn about the reward before finishing)
olafs quest
dream mentor
holy grail (prayer xp)
dragon slayer
monkey madness (talking to daero once you have finished killing the demon)
kings ransom
Most Requirements for Temple At stenstien (or w/e its pronounced)

[center][size=36pt][glow=red,2,300]Pay to Play training.[/glow][/size][/center]
Loads of money making ways to do this here are alot of commonly done ones:
Desert Goats 30k Xp 150k cash ph
Al-karid Warriors 100k-300k cash Ph 20k xp
Chaos druids (edgevile) 250k 20k xp ph
Chaos Druids (Yanile) 400k - 25k
Aviansie (Prayer)30k 200k-300k
Flesh Crawlers 30k 200k-400k
Soulwars 50k 0gp

I did goats from, 40 attack, 40 strength 35 range to all 70’s at goats (exept for attack witch i quested). I made alot of money, about 5m-8m
Once you have 70 range, do some Prayer Aviansie till 75 (if you don’t have prayer, killing chaos druids will do)
60 attack and Strength You have your Dragon Scimitar God book, Black d’hide chaps. Train at these spots. With trout, Lobster, Aviansie with prayer.
If you have a Verry low budget i’d do SoulWars for 100 Zeal, getting you about 50-55 Magic from 35. Once you have 40+ Do Mage Training Arena for mage exp and cash. (See bottom of this page for my Mage Training Guide).
[center] [/center] [center][/center]
[center][/center][center]Yes that was done with air strikes i had 89 zeal not 47 :S[/center]

[center][size=24pt][shadow=cyan,right]Food to use[/shadow][/size][/center]
If your going to be Training, I suggest trout or lobster.
Skilling, Trout or Salmon
Air orbs trout or salmon.

Pking P2P Shark/Rocktail/Tuna Potato
Pking F2P Lobster, Swordfish
[hr]

[center][glow=green,2,300][size=24pt]$$$Money$$$[/size][/glow][/center]
Getting Money on a pure can be quite tough, especially if you have no items.
Go to bob’s axes in Lumbridge, turn pikey mode on and take the free Bronze pickaxe and Bronze hatchet.

Woodcut to about 20 on Normal logs and sell to buy mithril and adamant.

Mine to about 20 on Clay and buy mithril, adamant and rune pickaxe.
I’d suggest getting 60-70 in both of these skills, they are great money makers.

Tanning Hides can be anything from 100k f2p to 500k P2P per hour. You just need 2 know what one is best.
Tanning 1 hide costs 20Gp. Add 20gp to the cost of the Untanned hide and then check the price of the Tanned hide. If you profit, do it.

70 Thieving is a great source of money. You can rake in 5m and get a nice stat to 70. 1-25 Women at varrock 25-38 Ardy Warriors 38-99 Master farmers at Draynor.

Flax spinning is Great. 19k Xp ph with 230k Cash ph. Brilliant way to make cash. Do this in a PvP world Lumbridge. It’s a safe zone and nobody will think to find you there.

Smithing Cannon balls is about 10k exp Ph with 100k Cash ph!
No pic for this

Sorceress Guarden is a Great way to make cash. Its the Non-cb GDK Imo. 3k Farm xp ph and 300k cash ph, Epic or what?!
[hr]

[hr]

Thanks to mining bot for letting me use this pic. Yes that is 55M gained!
Picking Flax is a nice way to make money if you don’t have SwampToads (witch is a waste of cash atm)

[center][size=36pt][shadow=red,left]To Pray or not to Pray[/shadow][/size][/center]
Getting Prayer on a pure Mainly is down to 2 things,
If your going to do bosses such as Godwars, Fire cape or
If you are going to Nh pk or if you dont want to be rushed in PvP/BH.

Imo, prayer is worth it. Godwars, Fire Cape are just to good 2 miss out on. Barrows is even easily done on a 1 defence pure. Aviansies are good 2 do to.

Prayer is a downside on one thing imo. Combat level. A pures aim IMO is to stay the lowest combat with nice Pking stats. Praying will not help this. Although you do need 13 Prayer to do Desert Treasure.

[center][size=24pt][glow=cyan,2,300]Defence?!?![/glow][/size][/center]
Getting 2 Defence will not make you “ruined” infact most sucsessful pures have had some slips. Dutch Lmfao got 3 defence, Bonesaw Pk is 21, Wtf_elvemage gotten 46 Before Turmoil. Just don’t let the Fact of a defence level change your mind about staying a pure. Being a pure is Great. Only get 45 Defence when you feel you are ready. Basicly when you have time to do quests, Torso and if you don’t have AutoPestcontrol Pro time to get void. Barrows gloves are not 100% needed but they make you look better than some faggy little bracelet. Rune Gloves arn’t the best for a rune pure but are a pritty decent glove to wear. 20 Defence pures can also wear rune gloves.

Berserker pures also have enough Defence to Abyssal Runecraft. Also GDK and tank Aviansie. And do much better GWD. But take it from me. We get Faggy targets that think they are pro because they pray your dds spec, ROL, Farcast and cry about venge. Pures imo have alot of Honour. When i was a pure people ate, never prayed. People Didn’t safe much. 90% of people were willing to DM.

Read full topic
